locations: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil::(all over)
imdb.plot outline: VidAnormal was a Brazilian humor television series that aired on TVCOM from Monday to Friday, with a reprise on Saturday and Sunday in Rio Grande do Sul. Created by Pedro Maron and Thiago Lazeri. As major casting Marcos Kligman, Manu Menezes, Bruno Bazzo, Pedro Maron e Luiza Pacheco. Initially called POARS, it started being shown by PoaTV, then it went to UlbraTV. The name was changed to the current one on February 1, 2007, when it was broadcast by TVCOM. It was ended at 2008.
imdb.title: VidAnormal
plot: _VidAnormal_ (qv) was a Brazilian humor television series that aired on TVCOM from Monday to Friday, with a reprise on Saturday and Sunday in Rio Grande do Sul. Created by Pedro Maron and Thiago Lazeri. As major casting Marcos Kligman, Manu Menezes, Bruno Bazzo, Pedro Maron e Luiza Pacheco. Initially called POARS, it started being shown by PoaTV, then it went to UlbraTV. The name was changed to the current one on February 1, 2007, when it was broadcast by TVCOM. It was ended at 2008.::https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/_VidAnormal_ (qv)
